fks_web.name: fks_web

databases.name: fks_web_db
databases.purpose: Application-specific data (UserProfile, PortfolioAccount, TradingSignal, APIKey, etc.)

fks_web.note: Port 3001 in Kubernetes, port 8000 in Docker. Uses separate database (fks_web_db) for app data.

fks_data.name: fks_data

databases.name: fks_data_db
databases.purpose: Market data storage (TimescaleDB for time-series data)

fks_data.note: Market data service. Migrated to FastAPI. Supports Massive.com Futures API (REST + WebSocket). All futures endpoints available at /api/v1/futures/*

fks_execution_main.name: fks_execution_main
fks_execution_main.note: Main execution service for traditional markets (stocks, futures via NinjaTrader, MT5)

fks_execution_crypto.name: fks_execution_crypto
fks_execution_crypto.note: Crypto execution service for fast order execution on crypto exchanges (Binance, Bybit, KuCoin)

fks_ninja.name: fks_ninja
fks_ninja.note: Python/Rust API service communicating with NinjaTrader8 via TCP sockets (port 8080). NinjaTrader8 runs separately on Windows desktop (100.80.141.117:8080).

fks_ai.name: fks_ai
fks_ai.note: GPU support enabled (1x nvidia.com/gpu). Uses fks_ollama for LLM inference.

fks_ollama.name: fks_ollama
fks_ollama.note: Standalone Ollama service for local LLM inference. Used by fks_ai and fks_analyze_main.

fks_analyze_main.name: fks_analyze_main
fks_analyze_main.note: Main analysis service that aggregates market info from all analyzer services. Other FKS services get market info from here.

fks_analyze_crypto_spot.name: fks_analyze_crypto_spot
fks_analyze_crypto_spot.note: Crypto spot analysis service. Communicates with fks_analyze_main to provide market info.

fks_analyze_crypto_futures.name: fks_analyze_crypto_futures
fks_analyze_crypto_futures.note: Crypto futures analysis service. Communicates with fks_analyze_main to provide market info.

fks_auth.name: fks_auth

databases.name: fks_auth_db
databases.purpose: Authentication data (users, roles, permissions). Currently in dev mode with hardcoded users.

fks_auth.note: Rust/Axum authentication service. Currently runs in dev mode with hardcoded users. Database ready for future migration.

fks_monitor.name: fks_monitor
fks_monitor.note: Monitors all FKS services and provides unified API for fks_main orchestration. Health endpoint at /health/health

fks_futures.name: fks_futures
fks_futures.note: Futures trading service for CME Group futures contracts. Provides futures-specific signals and analysis. Integrates with NinjaTrader8 via fks_ninja.

fks_data_ingestion.name: fks_data_ingestion
fks_data_ingestion.note: Data ingestion service for stock, futures, and news data from Massive.com and NewsAPI. Includes gap detection and completeness checking.

fks_feature_engineering.name: fks_feature_engineering
fks_feature_engineering.note: Feature engineering service for computing 112+ features from raw market data. Technical indicators, correlations, Fourier analysis, ARIMA, and FinBERT sentiment.
